name: AbstractButton
text:
A base class that defines common properties for all
button types. AbstractButton is not generally useful to
instantiate on its own.

attrs.name: callback
descs: A callback to run in the browser whenever the button is activated.

attrs.name: icon
descs: An optional image appearing to the left of button’s text.

attrs.name: label
descs: The text label for the button to display.

json:
{
  "button_type": "default",
  "callback": null,
  "css_classes": null,
  "disabled": false,
  "height": null,
  "icon": null,
  "id": "9a1e463f-491b-4044-bbd7-465a7dc2bcdb",
  "js_callbacks": {},
  "label": "Button",
  "name": null,
  "sizing_mode": "fixed",
  "tags": [],
  "width": null
}

name: Button

attrs.name: clicks
descs: A private property used to trigger on_click event handler.

json:
{
  "button_type": "default",
  "callback": null,
  "clicks": 0,
  "css_classes": null,
  "disabled": false,
  "height": null,
  "icon": null,
  "id": "f7f59101-907e-4285-af4f-e8a40d6d76c0",
  "js_callbacks": {},
  "label": "Button",
  "name": null,
  "sizing_mode": "fixed",
  "tags": [],
  "width": null
}

attrs.name: button_type
descs: A style for the button, signifying it’s role.

name: Dropdown

attrs.name: default_value
descs: The default value, otherwise the first item in menu will be used.

attrs.name: menu
descs: property type: List ( Tuple ( String , String  ) )

Button’s dropdown menu consisting of entries containing item’s text and
value name. Use None as a menu separator.

attrs.name: value
descs: A private property used to trigger on_click event handler.

json:
{
  "button_type": "default",
  "callback": null,
  "css_classes": null,
  "default_value": null,
  "disabled": false,
  "height": null,
  "icon": null,
  "id": "68096891-c1e9-4a00-b27e-435d0c9057f3",
  "js_callbacks": {},
  "label": "Dropdown",
  "menu": [],
  "name": null,
  "sizing_mode": "fixed",
  "tags": [],
  "value": null,
  "width": null
}

name: Toggle

attrs.name: active
descs:
The initial state of a button. Also used to trigger on_click event
handler.

json:
{
  "active": false,
